fulltext:
Trang Nguyen 
IT RECRUITER 
OBJECTIVE 
I have 2 years recruit in IT field, I take advantages of HR skills & experience and understanding of recruitment 
market to bring a lot value to a startup company. Now, I want to challenge myself in a new environment to 
work and refine my skills. I believe that my education background, HR experience, and qualifications would 
make me a perfect fit for your company. 
EDUCATION 
MAJOR: OFFICE MANAGEMENT 
SAI GON UNIVERSITY 
2013 - 2017 
Degree classification: Good 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
HR EXECUTIVE 
HOME IQ TECHNOLOGY AND TRADING COMPANY LIMITED 
Aug 2017 - Present 
Main responsibilities: 
• Recruiting IT positions for startup. Successful recruited: iOS, 
Android, Frontend, Tester, UI-UX Designer, Embedded, Hardware 
Design Engineer and other positions. 
• Writing and posting technical job descriptions. 
• Parse specialized skills and qualifications to screen resumes 
based on staff requisition form. Make pre-screening calls to 
analyze applicants’ abilities. 
• Arrange and organize interviews for all Departments. 
Interviewing candidates combining various methods. 
• Update and manage candidate profiles, send Offer Letter and 
interview's result for candidates. 
• Deal with employee requests regarding human resources issues, 
rules, and regulations. 
• Take responsibility of C&B, social insurance. 
• Support other tasks like website & mobile app content... 
Achievements and skills gained: 
• Have general knowledge of IT field. 
• Recruitment skills, screen candidates. 
• Resolve problems on employee's relationship 
• Improve English. 
RECRUITMENT FREELANCER 
VINSCHOOL EDUCATION SYSTEM OF VINGROUP JSC 
Mar 2017 - Aug 2017 
• Main tasks: 
- Post recruitment information of the company via social media. 
- Support HR team to organize staff activities: staff party, meetings; 
- Receive and screen candidates. Call interview with candidates. 
- Create sources for recruitment positions. 
- Organize interview schedules. 
- Carry out procedures after interview: respond to candidate, 
Negotiate wages and send job offer. 
- Support Training and environmental integration for new candidates. 
PG PART-TIME 
PG OF MANY BRAND LAUNCH SOME EVENTS 
Oct 2013 - Dec 2016 
• I work to gain more practical experience and be familiar with the 
working environment. My work gives me communication 
skills, teamwork skills, consulting skills and I can work under 
high pressure. 
SKILLS 
Researching skills 
HR - Screen IT CV - C&B 
Computer skills – Google Drive, Outlook 
English 
CERTIFICATIONS & AWARDS 
Foundation Human Resources 
Profession 2018 
This program's contents include: 
The Overview of HRM, JD writing, recruitment & 
selection, business integration, labour code practice 
in the enterprise, payroll administration. Grade: Good
